body_html: tf.contrib.estimator.replicate_model_fn is deprecated in favor of tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy. Have you had a chance to try that? I'm sure feedback on the new API would be welcome.
body_text: tf.contrib.estimator.replicate_model_fn is deprecated in favor of tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy. Have you had a chance to try that? I'm sure feedback on the new API would be welcome.
body: `tf.contrib.estimator.replicate_model_fn` is deprecated in favor of [`tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy`](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/distribute/MirroredStrategy). Have you had a chance to try that? I'm sure feedback on the new API would be welcome.
